data.message: Creative Direction Framework: Use Double Diamond (Discover→Define→Develop→Deliver) for original work. Key techniques: 1) Start with constraints not blank canvas, 2) Research deeply before ideating, 3) Generate 10+ concepts before refining, 4) Use SCAMPER (Substitute, Combine, Adapt, Modify, Put to other uses, Eliminate, Reverse), 5) Avoid first-instinct solutions - they're usually generic. Red flags for generic design: stock photo vibes, safe color choices, predictable layouts, lack of intentional tension.
